channel.title: Need help creating another sign
channel.description:
Im back, and I need to know how to make ANOTHER sign. Lol
I tried doing this on my own this time before asking, didn't workout so great..
Well, this time I need help making a sign where; IF your in a clan, then at the top of your screen it would say Clan: {Clan Name} If your not then it'll just be blank.
[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 02:06:14 PM[/size][hr]I guess none of the MoparscapeCMs are on today.
Thats who helped me last time.
Ahh well.
Guess Ill have to wait for this.

item.title: Need help creating another sign
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Thanks Ill try that out now[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 04:51:01 PM[/size][hr]Nope that didn’t work.

Anyone else know?

item.title: Need help creating another sign
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

I spose you used lothys tut? Then all you do is add this…

sendFrame126("You are in "+clanName, 6570);

Or something along them lines…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help creating another sign
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Yeah but see this is for “Clans” I added clans system to my server.

Therefore I wanted to make a sign saying what clan that person is in.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help creating another sign
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

search public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
Inside it put public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("TEXT HERE", 6570); }

Read full topic
